hero.title: The Spirit of Ireland Draw
hero.subtitle: 32 chances to win a bottle of spirits for just €10 a ticket! All proceeds going to local charities and sports clubs.

aboutTheDraw.title: About the Draw
aboutTheDraw.visualAlt: A collection of 32 bottles of Irish spirits, one from each county.
aboutTheDraw.howItWorksDetails: 32 bottles of spirits, worth up to €150, are up for grabs. One bottle from each county with 32 lucky winners.
aboutTheDraw.whenDetails: Main draw will take place December 28th with prize winners throughout December.
aboutTheDraw.whoBenefitsDetails: All proceeds go to The Con Houlihan Foundation and the Dingle Rugby Club.
